name: Beelive
description:
Follow the journey of a bee wondering through a forest, and the dangers that come with it.

This game was made by a year 2 Game Design university team compromising of:

Jack Milinczuk - Blueprints/UI

Jan Palka - Blueprints/Level Design - rayhapman

Nathan Brittain - Blueprints/Level Design

Diogo Malho - Blueprints/Level Design

Brandon Steverson - Blueprints/Level Design

Robbie Moran - Blueprints/Level Design
